posts.post_title: T200 Teams for Sale- Prices Reduced as of 11/9/09
posts.post_content:
All cards listed are priced including shipping. Feel free to pay by Check/Money Order or Paypal (no fee). Feel free to make offers on groups (I am also offering a 10% discount on groups of 5 or more).

Trades would also be entertained for certain Baseball, Football or Hockey Hall of Famers e-mail me if you want to trade.

Scans are available [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/T200%20Teams/"]Here[/URL]
